#summary Aspects of building a molecule
#labels Development,Notes

= Details =

  * Test data set: the usual 10K pubchem compounds.
  * Code version: svn, 5 April 2011
  * Platform: Gulo/Windows, Python2.7, Boost1.45
  
= Results =

|| What || Time || Command ||
|| Parse with sanitization || 9.1s || `m2s=[x for x in Chem.SDMolSupplier('PubChemBackground.sdf')]` ||
|| Parse with no sanitization || 4.6s || `ms=[x for x in Chem.SDMolSupplier('PubChemBackground.sdf',sanitize=False)]` ||
|| Full Sanitization || 2.4s || `[Chem.SanitizeMol(x) for x in ms]` ||
|| Assign Stereochemistry || 3.1s || `[Chem.AssignStereochemistry(x) for x in ms]`||
|| Find SSSR || 1.2s || `[Chem.GetSSSR(x) for x in ms]` ||
|| Symmetrize SSSR || 0.1s || `[Chem.GetSymmSSSR(x) for x in ms]` ||
